FREMANTLE captain Nathan Fyfe is recovering well from his latest concussion and has returned to light running in the early stages of his mandatory 12-day period on the sidelines.

articles.title: Buddy blow: Franklin out of Swans' clash with Richmond - AFL
articles.description: Sydney rules out veteran Lance Franklin from its big test against Dustin Martin and the Tigers
articles.content:
SYDNEY modern-day-great Lance Franklin will miss the much-anticipated clash with rival superstar Dustin Martin at the MCG on Saturday afternoon.
Franklin returned from a 19-month layoff in round two… [+1629 chars]

articles.content:
